meanings.sent1: She outfrowns her brother when they are upset.
meanings.sent2: He always outfrowns when he is angry.
meanings.sent3: The grumpy cat outfrowns the grumpy dog.
meanings.sent4: Her deep frown outfrowns all others in the room.
meanings.sent5: His intense frown outfrowns everyone else's expressions.

meanings.definition: To show disapproval or displeasure with a facial expression
meanings.sent1: Mom outfrowns at his messy room every day.
meanings.sent2: The teacher outfrowns when students misbehave.
meanings.sent3: The baby outfrowns at the taste of the food.
meanings.sent4: Her disapproving frown outfrowns all other reactions.
meanings.sent5: His displeased frown outfrowns all other expressions in the room.

meanings.definition: To have a more negative or serious expression than someone else
meanings.sent1: She always outfrowns her friends in photos.
meanings.sent2: He tends to outfrown during serious conversations.
meanings.sent3: The grumpy cat always outfrowns the happy dog.
meanings.sent4: Her serious frown outfrowns all other expressions.
meanings.sent5: His negative frown outfrowns everyone else's reactions.
